sentences.english: OBJECTIVE To analyze the oil content and fatty acids composition in Trichosanthes rosthornii seeds.

sentences.english: Objective To determine the inorganic elements contents and pesticide residues of Shandong genuine Trichosanthes kirilowii.

sentences.english: Objective To study the effect of Gualou Gancao Granules(GLGC)on influenza virus pneumonia mice.

sentences.english: ConclusionJGXBD has the effects of anticoagulation and fibrinolysis.

sentences.english: MethodsPolysaccharides of Pericarpium Trichosanthis were obtained by hot water extraction and alcohol sedimentation.
